extendedInfo.description: Trophy checklist for Mass Effect 3 on the PS3, to keep track of your progress towards Platinum.. All 69 Trophies included. This includes the From Ashes, Leviatian, Omega and Citadel DLC Trophies.. Descriptions for all 69 Trophies. Your trophy progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your trophy progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Trophy description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Electronic Arts or BioWare.
